channel.title: Nevada on Nii's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nevada on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Photos of Las Vegas
item.description: [](/images/2010/10/dscf0049.jpg) Photos from Las Vegas! We went to Hollywood after Las Vegas and I have to admit it was very underwhelming. I think its because I just came from a massive high class extravagant casino resort, and Hollywood was just a normal city. Las Vegas has several large buildings on the strip (a road housing all the big casinos), each with there own theme. For instance, there is the Tropicana (tropical theme), Caesarâ€™s Palace (roman theme), Excalibur (medieval theme), Paris (french theme) etc.
